title: PENDING - T202 lot of 7 with Cy Young and 5 other HOF'ers - Low Condition
author: brianp-beme

posts.post_title: PENDING - T202 lot of 7 with Cy Young and 5 other HOF'ers - Low Condition
posts.post_content:
I have the following 7 fairly messed up T202 cards with obvious big time issues.  Does include Cy Young, Frank Baker, Joe Tinker and Clark Griffith on the ends, a John McGraw and Chief Bender center panel

The price for the lot is $120.00, with free shipping. PM if you have any questions about individual cards.

I also will have low condition group lots of T205 (includes Ed Walsh and Minor League card) and 1934 Goudey cards with 5 HOF including Dizzy Dean, and a group lot of 1933 Goudey that verges on okay condition and has 13 Hall of Famers including Mel Ott.

There will be a 10% discount off total if 2 or 3 of these groups are purchased, and 15% if all 4 are purchased.  Commitment to buy snags these cards, and I will ship promptly and securely. PM's preferred. Fronts and backs of each of the cards are pictured below. 

Brian

I willt ake the t202s

Mac
